Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword.impl

Class JSwordModuleServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword.impl.JSwordModuleServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
JSwordModuleService
@Singleton public class JSwordModuleServiceImpl extends Object implements JSwordModuleService
Service to manipulate modules

    • JSwordModuleServiceImpl

      @Inject public JSwordModuleServiceImpl(@Named("onlineInstallers") List<org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.Installer> installers, @Named("offlineInstallers") List<org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.Installer> offlineInstallers, JSwordVersificationService versificationService, VersionResolver versionResolver)
      Parameters:
      installers - a list of installers to use to download books
      offlineInstallers - the set of installers to use offline, rather than online

  • Method Details

    • getInstallers

      public List<org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.Installer> getInstallers()
      Description copied from interface: JSwordModuleService
      This method is deliberately placed at the top of the file to raise awareness that sensitive countries may not wish to access the internet.

      If the installation is set to "offline", then only return the offline installers.

      Specified by:
      getInstallers in interface JSwordModuleService
      Returns:
      a set of installers
